long_description: The Sierra Designs Mojo 3 tent blends ample headroom, abundant mesh, ultra lightweight materials and an integrated rainfly for outstanding comfort on the trail and a quick, easy setup. Less material saves weight: An exterior frame combined with hybrid panels allows double walls where necessary and single walls otherwise. Integration of the rainfly means the tent is protected during setup; the inner body of the tent won't get soaked since there's no separate rainfly to attach. The exoskeletong/hybrid wall construction allows for venting and airflow planning not possible with traditional construction. D-shaped door provides easy access without the need to crawl over your tentmates; a roomy vestibule stores gear without being oversized. Light yet strong, DAC Featherlite(R) NSL poles are anodized without the use of harmful acids. Taped rainfly seams and a PVC-free, seam-sealed floor offer weatherproof protection. Reflective door trim and guyouts aid nighttime visibility of the Sierra Designs Mojo 3 tent. Mesh windows have closeable flaps to prevent weather from creeping in. Internal pockets keeps small gear organized. Includes stuff sacks, guylines, tent stakes, user guide and setup instructions.
short_description: The Sierra Designs Mojo 3 tent blends ample headroom, abundant mesh, ultra lightweight materials and an integrated rainfly for outstanding comfort on the trail and a quick, easy setup.
